WRITING.TEXT: Truck driver was ok, he broke the fuel tank and blow up his tire.

WRITING.TITLE: [Slovenia] This Is Why You Don't Use Mobile Phone While Driving - First Crash Captured On My Old Dash Cam

WRITING.TEXT: This is from downhill in Kitzbhel, Austria. Due low temperatures everything was really icy. This is Norwegian skier Aksel Lund Svindal, who got serious knee injury. Austrians Georg Streitberger ([video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8XWPBAtH8o)) and Hannes Reichelt ([video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BcISTc__92I)) crashed on the same spot. Streitberger got his knee operated too, Reichelt was ok.

WRITING.TITLE: Bad Santa will make you feel bad for laughing!
